name: Characters - The Nexus
body:
This article is about the characters in the comic that appear and have names. You may be looking for the unnamed or unseen characters.

The following is a complete pictorial list of the characters in The Walking Dead Comic Series; they are grouped by families or groups of survivors and roughly in order of first appearance.

Key
 Alive
 Dead
 Unknown
  • A character with an "Unknown" status was alive when last seen, but was injured, lost, or unsecured since.
